data.description:
# What Does Tennis Vision VR Do?
Tennis Vision VR trains all of the visual skills needed in tennis:

- **Faster reactions**: So you can easily return bigger serves and have more time on your shots.

- **Better anticipation**: So you can predict where your opponents are going to hit their shot.

- **Quicker decision making**: So you can play the right shot at the right time, even when under pressure.

- ​**Enhanced focus & concentration**: So you can make less silly errors and can play your best tennis when it matters most on the big points.
- **Better ball tracking**: So you watch the ball more effectively through to contact to increase consistency, even when being offensive.

- ​**Cleaner timing**: So you can feel more confident in your ball striking.​

# Who Is Tennis Vision VR For?
Tennis Vision VR is designed for competitive tennis players who want to gain an edge over their competition. It's perfect for competitive junior/college &, professional players.

# How Does Tennis Vision VR Work?
Tennis vision VR uses the concepts of applied neuroscience and neuroplasticity to make you a better player. It trains the parts of your brain that create and control all the visual skills needed for tennis.

Think of it like a strength and conditioning program, but for your reactions, ball tracking, focus & decision making etc.

It takes exercises that have been tried and tested in the fields of "functional neurology", "vision therapy" & "behavioural optometry" and packages them into an easy to use Virtual Reality app.
